item.title: Malware Researcher Roadmap
item.description: Final goal: malware researcher/analyst Basics: http://catb.org/%7Eesr/faqs/smart-questions.html math: college linear algebra probability and statistics networking: CCNA system administration: https://www.reddit.com/r/sysadmin/wiki/learn https://www.reddit.com/r/sysadmin/wiki/bootcamp windows: MCSE AD, DC, DNS, DHCP, GPO linux: RHCSA7/8 tooling: the ida pro book - eagle reverse engineering: Reversing: Secrets of Reverse Engineering - eldad eilam (choose one) Reverse Engineering for Begginers - dennis yurichev malware analysis: begginer:
